activities: Knack makes it simple for small businesses and organizations to build online databases and web apps to better manage their data.  Customers can import their data with spreadsheets that are specific to their business.  We make it easy to build powerful web apps like inventory management, employee updates, event management, client portals, CRMs, and more.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We initially collect customer's email and name.  Paid customers we collect payment information.  Beyond that, our product allows customers to build apps that accommodate the needs of their business.  That data could include anything including organization, client, customer, clinical trial data, etc..
